title: Hudson Pacific Properties, Inc. (HPP) Q2 2025 Earnings Call Transcript
description: Hudson Pacific Properties, Inc. (NYSE:HPP) Q2 2025 Earnings Call August 5, 2025 5:00 PM ETCompany ParticipantsArthur X.
content:
Arthur X. Suazo - Executive Vice President of Leasing

 Harout Krikor Diramerian - Chief Financial Officer

 Laura Campbell - Executive Vice President of Investor Relations & Marketing

 Mark T. Lammas - President & Treasurer

 Victor J. Coleman - Chairman & CEO

Alexander David Goldfarb - Piper Sandler & Co., Research Division

 Blaine Matthew Heck - Wells Fargo Securities, LLC, Research Division

 Caitlin Burrows - Goldman Sachs Group, Inc., Research Division

 Dylan Robert Burzinski - Green Street Advisors, LLC, Research Division

 John P. Kim - BMO Capital Markets Equity Research

 Peter Dylan Abramowitz - Jefferies LLC, Research Division

 Ronald Kamdem - Morgan Stanley, Research Division

 Seth Eugene Bergey - Citigroup Inc. Exchange Research

 Vikram L. Malhotra - Mizuho Securities USA LLC, Research Division

 William Thomas Catherwood - BTIG, LLC, Research Division

Good afternoon. My name is Alex, and I will be your conference operator today. At this time, I'd like to welcome everyone to the Hudson Pacific Properties Second Quarter 2025 Earnings Conference Call.

At this time, I'd like to turn the call over to Laura Campbell, Executive Vice President, Investor Relations and Marketing. Please go ahead.

Good afternoon, everyone. Thanks for joining us. With me on the call today are Victor Coleman, CEO and Chairman; Mark Lammas, President; Harout Diramerian, CFO; and Art Suazo, EVP of Leasing.

This afternoon, we filed our earnings release and supplemental on an 8-K with the SEC, and both are now available on our website. An audio webcast of this call will also be available for replay on our website. Some of the information we'll share on the call today is forward-looking in nature. Please reference our earnings release and supplemental for statements regarding forward-looking
summary: Hudson Pacific Properties (HPP) is set to hold a Q2 2025 Earnings Conference Call, with representatives from Victor Coleman, Mark Lammas, Harout Diramerian, and Art Suazo. The company's earnings release and supplemental on an 8-K with the SEC are now available on their website. An audio webcast of this call will also be available for replay on our website. Some of the information shared on the call is forward-looking in nature.
shortSummary: Hudley Pacific Properties' Q2 2025 earnings call will be conducted via Skype, with keynotes from CEO Victor Coleman and CFO Harout Diramerian.
argos_summary: The Hudson Pacific Properties held its Second Quarter 2025 Earnings Conference Call, featuring key executives including CEO Victor Coleman, CFO Harout Diramerian, and EVP Laura Campbell. The earnings release and supplemental information were filed with the SEC and are accessible on their website, along with an audio webcast of the call. Participants were reminded that some information shared during the call may be forward-looking.
